greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rectangular array R by antidiagonals: label each unit square in the first quadrant lattice by its northeast vertex (x,y) and mark squares having |x-y|=0(mod 3); then R(m,n) is the number of marked squares in the rectangle [0,m] X [0,n].
comment: Rows numbered 3,6,9,12,15,... are, except for initial terms, multiples of (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,...)=A000027.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 06 2008
